mapper.insert: insert into project_team ( project_id, user_id, user_role, team_role ) values ( #{project_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_role}, #{team_role} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name name,u.department_id department_id, t.user_role user_role,t.team_role team_role FROM user u, project p, project_team t WHERE p.project_id = #{project_id} and p.project_id = t.project_id and t.user_id = u.user_id
